a.title: Return to the homepage on the district site.
San Mateo Union High School District

div.h3: A Commitment to Quality Education for a Better Future

a.span: 学区总监 Skelly 号的最新更新
County and State Notices and Orders
San Mateo County Office of Education Resources
San Mateo Union High School District

div.h1: Mental Health Resources for Students During School Closures

p.span: We recognize that our students may feel additional stress and anxiety during this period of uncertainty. Students can request to speak with a Wellness Counselor while schools are closed by filling out a form specific to their school site at the bottom of this page.
Appointments are available during regular school hours, Monday-Friday from 8 a.m. - 3:30 p.m.
If this is a medical or mental health emergency,
p.strong: please do not fill out the form, and contact the following sources immediately:

ul.li: 911 or visit your nearest hospital emergency room if you can get there safely

p.span: produced by the National Association of School Psychologists about talking to children about COVID-19.

span.strong: Students and families: Make an appointment with a Wellness Counselor

div.h1: Wellness Resources for Parents and Guardians

strong.a: OnYourMind - Peer Supported Teen Crisis Chat

p.span: program that provides a safe and anonymous place for teens and youth to talk
You can talk about anything that’s on your mind- including relationships, school, depression, stress, suicide, friends, parents, cutting, identity, and health.

span.p: VirusAnxiety.org: A curated page of reliable, accessible articlesto help you take care of your mental health.

p.a: Child Mind Institute: Coping During COV1D19 - Resources for Families
Mindful.org: A Daily Mindful Walking Practice
Pocket Mindfulness: 6 Mindfulness Excercises You Can Try Today

span.p: 5 Ways to Help Teens Manage Anxiety About the Coronavirus (NY Times login required)

p.a: Coping with Stress During Infectious Disease Outbreaks
Talking to Your Children about COVID-19: A Parent Resource
Hable con sus hijos sobre el COVID-19 (Coronavirus) Un recurso para padres
和孩子談論COVID-19(冠狀病毒)家長資源 (PDF, Chinese)
How to Talk to Kids and Teens About the Coronavirus
p.br: Plus comics, podcasts, and links to support your efforts

div.h1: Free Mental Health and Life Guide App for Students

img.style: border: 1px solid; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
img.title: Atlas Mental Health and Wellness Guide App
img.alt: Atlas Mental Health and Wellness Guide App

span.p: The SMUHSD Mental Health and Wellness team is excited to announce that students in the San Mateo Union High School District are being offered free access to the Atlas Life Guide to Mental Health app, a new social media app that makes people feel good about themselves.

Atlas facilitates guided journaling around topics focused on life's central concerns while teaching concepts from Mindfulness, Social Emotional Learning, Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, Positive Psychology and Self Compassion research.

div.h2: San Mateo Union High School District
div.p: 650 N. Delaware Street, San Mateo, CA 94401
